thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Giorgos Agopian
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Giorgos Agopian

author: Giorgos Agopian
title: Giorgos Agopian
text:
Have been buying from Banggood for a few years.
They have a ton of stuff, very good prices and their shipping and packaging are impeccable.
With some research and by reading reviews on their website I have purchased many quality items.
On the rare case of a problem the customer service is an example for everyone, always fast and helpful to resolve any issue!!!
Keep up the good work!
